name: The Immortal Zugzwang
description:
Join G-Pawn and H-Pawn on a quest for glory in one of the finest chess games of all time: Nimzowitsch's Immortal Zugzwang Game. A short educational VN!

Want to learn more about the Immortal Zugzwang Game? Check out these resources:

  • Nimzowitsch's own notes on Wikipedia
  • Sam Copeland on Chess.com
  • agadmator's Chess Channel

You can play the prequel, The Immortal Game, here. (I made it in under four hours, so it's not very good. I spent a little longer on this one!)
